alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 10:26PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ashland, Price and southeastern Sawyer Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1026 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Winter, to near Catawba, to near Rib Lake, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Falls, Phillips, Fifield, Ogema, Prentice, Butternut, Spirit, Catawba, Glidden, Kennan, Connors Lake, Clifford, Wilson Lake Near Phillips, Brantwood, Butternut Lake, Cranberry Lake, and Musser Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Wisconsin.
